item.title: CVE-2019-8956|2024-08-04T21:31:37.498Z -- unknown -- linux%20kernel
item.description: In the Linux Kernel before versions 4.20.8 and 4.19.21 a use-after-free error in the "sctp_sendmsg()" function (net/sctp/socket.c) when handling SCTP_SENDALL flag can be exploited to corrupt memory.
